Prep Time: 10 Minutes
Cook Time: 12 Minutes
Ready In: 25 Minutes
Servings: 4

Ingredients:
1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed
cooking spray
salt and pepper to taste
2 tablespoons butter
1 tablespoon soy sauce
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Arrange the asparagus on a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Coat with cooking spray, and season with salt and pepper.
3. Bake asparagus 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until tender.
4. Lightly brown the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Remove
from heat, and stir in soy sauce and balsamic vinegar. Pour over the
baked asparagus to serve.
